ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech
ModMetaData.author: Xavior
ModMetaData.description:
(Unofficial Version for 1.4 and below) I am not the original author GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos.
Original Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725576127 Pulled and updated from: 725576127 mod folder Original Git Repo: https://github.com/sam23694/GlitterTech/tree/1.0.2059 Current Mod Repo: https://github.com/mdrain18/XaviorsGlitterTech.git
Updating Mod: It can be said this mod is OP. I think it should be, however, in the spirt of being able to play how you want to I am adding a few changes to this mod.
1) Updating to 1.4 (in progress) 2) Adding slider: this will increase everything by a multiplier. (in progress) 1x: Default, which doesn't change anything 2x: Max, doubles everything (not recommended) .1x: Makes everything suck 3) Individual sliders: this will target specific items, like beta or alpha poly and allow you to configure the individual stats of each item 4) Craft Glitter Tech: there is a mod for this already but I wanted to add the ability to this mod with the ability to turn it on or off. This will be different and require special items only found through questing. Similar to relics... 5) More..... STUFF! Starting with Glitter swords and Glitter psycasts... I think. Not sure if I will ever get here but I'm being optimistic
Let me know in the "Changes" discussion what you want done with this mod and I will do my best to make it happen. Link below: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2558099206/3480742287613877229/
